com.i2group.apollo.itemretrievalservice
Interface IItemRetrievalService

public interface IItemRetrievalService

A pair of methods for retrieving Items from the repository.

If any of the Items are Links, then the latest versions of their ends are also retrieved, unless a specific version of one of those Entitys is requested at the same time. In that case, the specific version of the Entity is returned.

If any of the Items has acted as the source in a merge operation, then the target in that merge operation is also retrieved.

The following rules determine whether and how Items are returned by the methods of IItemRetrievalService:

An Item is not returned when:

  • The Item does not exist.
  • The user has an access level of SecurityAccessLevel.NONE and a grant level of SecurityGrantLevel.NONE on the Item.
  • The Item is a Link that has an end Entity on which the user has an access level of SecurityAccessLevel.NONE and a grant level of SecurityGrantLevel.NONE.
An Item is returned as an ItemPlaceholder when:
  • The Item is deleted.
  • The Item has acted as the source in a merge operation.
  • The user has an access level of SecurityAccessLevel.READ_CLOAKED on the Item.
  • The user has an access level of SecurityAccessLevel.NONE but a grant level of more than SecurityGrantLevel.NONE on the Item.
An Item is returned as an Item when:
  • The Item is not deleted, and the user has an access level of SecurityAccessLevel.READ_ONLY (or above) on the Item.
Items and ItemPlaceholders will contain SecurityAccessPermissions and SecurityGrantPermissions if the user has a grant level of SecurityGrantLevel.UPDATE.

Since:
1.0

Method Summary
 ItemResults getItems(List<ItemIdentifierAndVersion> itemIdentifierAndVersions)
          Gets an ItemResults containing Items identified by the specified ItemIdentifierAndVersions.
 ItemResults getLatestItems(List<ItemIdentifier> itemIdentifiers)
          Gets an ItemResults containing the latest versions of the Items identified by the specified ItemIdentifiers.
 

Method Detail

getItems

ItemResults getItems(List<ItemIdentifierAndVersion> itemIdentifierAndVersions)
                     throws InvalidArgumentException
Gets an ItemResults containing Items identified by the specified ItemIdentifierAndVersions.

Generates a SOAP fault if the number of itemIdentifierAndVersions exceeds the maximum limit of items to request.

See the IItemRetrievalService interface documentation for details about behavior that is common to all its methods.

Parameters:
itemIdentifierAndVersions - The ItemIdentifierAndVersions of the Items to retrieve.
Returns:
See above. The ItemResults may contain Items for none, some, or all of the ItemIdentifierAndVersions, according to the rules of the IItemRetrievalService interface.
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - If an item was requested more than once (even at different versions).

getLatestItems

ItemResults getLatestItems(List<ItemIdentifier> itemIdentifiers)
Gets an ItemResults containing the latest versions of the Items identified by the specified ItemIdentifiers.

Generates a SOAP fault if the number of itemIdentifierAndVersions exceeds the maximum limit of items to request.

See the IItemRetrievalService interface documentation for details about behavior that is common to all its methods.

Parameters:
itemIdentifiers - The ItemIdentifiers of the Items to retrieve. Duplicate ItemIdentifiers are ignored.
Returns:
See above. The ItemResults may contain Items for none, some, or all of the ItemIdentifierAndVersions, according to the rules of the IItemRetrievalService interface.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If the number of itemIdentifierAndVersions exceeds the maximum limit of allowed items to request.
